mapper.insert:
insert into dust_records(site_name, create_time, health_parameter, average_value, health_advice) values
(#{item.siteName}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.healthParameter}, #{item.averageValue}, #{item.healthAdvice})

INSERT INTO pollen_forecast(region_code, forecast_date, type, index_name, index_value, index_category) VALUES
(#{item.regionCode}, #{item.forecastDate}, #{item.type}, #{item.indexName}, #{item.indexValue}, #{item.indexCategory})
